https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/i1UwynWPdQp5yRIsAqudQXLVPPk.jpg The first fiction feature by Santi Taepanich collages the experiences of four residents of Bangkok whose lives are lived at night. They include a world-weary call-boy played by Ananda Everingham. Bangkok Time
